verses.verse: A Prayer of the afflicted, when he is overwhelmed, and poureth out his complaint before Jehovah. <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And let my <S%H7775>cry<s%> come unto <S%H935>thee<s%>.

Hide <S%H5641><s%> not thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6862>distress<s%>: <S%H5186>Incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto <S%H3117>me<s%>; In the day when I <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> me <S%H4118>speedily<s%>.
For my <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3615>consume<s%> away like <S%H6227>smoke<s%>, And my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H2787>burned<s%> as a <S%H4168>firebrand<s%>.
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H5221>smitten<s%> like <S%H6212>grass<s%>, and <S%H3001>withered<s%>; For I <S%H7911>forget<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> my <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
By reason of the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H585>groaning<s%> My <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> to my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
I am <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H6893>pelican<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; I am become as an <S%H3563>owl<s%> of the waste <S%H2723>places<s%>.
I <S%H8245>watch<s%>, and am become like a <S%H6833>sparrow<s%> That is <S%H909>alone<s%> upon the <S%H1406>house-top<s%>.
Mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%> me all the <S%H3117>day<s%>; They that are <S%H1984>mad<s%> against me do curse by <S%H7650>me<s%>.
For I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H665>ashes<s%> like <S%H3899>bread<s%>, And <S%H4537>mingled<s%> my <S%H8249>drink<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping<s%>,
Because <S%H6440><s%> of thine <S%H2195>indignation<s%> and thy <S%H7110>wrath<s%>: For thou hast taken me <S%H5375>up<s%>, and cast me <S%H7993>away<s%>.
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are like a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> that <S%H5186>declineth<s%>; And I am <S%H3001>withered<s%> like <S%H6212>grass<s%>.
But <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah, wilt <S%H3427>abide<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; And thy <S%H2143>memorial<s%> name unto <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
Thou wilt <S%H6965>arise<s%>, and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; For it is <S%H6256>time<s%> to have <S%H2603>pity<s%> upon <S%H4150>her<s%>, Yea, the set time is <S%H935>come<s%>.
For thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> take <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in her <S%H68>stones<s%>, And have <S%H2603>pity<s%> upon her <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
So the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> thy <S%H3519>glory<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath built <S%H1129>up<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; He hath <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in his <S%H3519>glory<s%>.
He hath <S%H6437>regarded<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of the <S%H6199>destitute<s%>, And hath not <S%H959>despised<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer<s%>.
This shall be <S%H3789>written<s%> for the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%>; And a <S%H5971>people<s%> which shall be <S%H1254>created<s%> shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>.
For he hath looked <S%H8259>down<s%> from the <S%H4791>height<s%> of his <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>; From <S%H8064>heaven<s%> did <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5027>behold<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>;
To <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H603>sighing<s%> of the <S%H615>prisoner<s%>; To <S%H6605>loose<s%> those that are <S%H1121>appointed<s%> to <S%H8546>death<s%>;
That men may <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, And his <S%H8416>praise<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>;
When the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, And the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>, to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
He <S%H6031>weakened<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>; He <S%H7114>shortened<s%> my <S%H3117>days<s%>.

I <S%H559>said<s%>, O my <S%H410>God<s%>, take me not <S%H5927>away<s%> in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of my <S%H3117>days<s%>: Thy <S%H8141>years<s%> are throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
Of <S%H6440>old<s%> didst thou lay the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

They shall <S%H6>perish<s%>, but thou shalt <S%H5975>endure<s%>; <S%H1086>Yea<s%>, all of them shall wax old like a <S%H899>garment<s%>; As a <S%H3830>vesture<s%> shalt thou <S%H2498>change<s%> <S%H2498>them<s%>, and they shall be changed:
But thou art the <S%H8141>same<s%>, And thy years shall have no <S%H8552>end<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H7931>continue<s%>, And their <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> before <S%H6440>thee<s%>.
